items.title: Parque de Sa Capeletta - Reina Sofía
items.address: Carrer de Joan Xicó, 1, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands
items.content: This super cute playground, shaded by beautiful trees, is right next to the castle walls. It features a few unique attractions and swings, perfect for a charming playdate.
items.summary: This super cute playground, shaded by beautiful trees, is right next to the castle walls.

items.title: De Vila Restaurante
items.address: Carrer de la Mare de Déu, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: This hidden gem offers a mix of tapas and great classic Spanish/Ibiza dishes in a cozy and casual setting. With a grand outdoor seating, heaters and a welcoming atmosphere, it’s perfect for families looking for a relaxed meal while the kids can play on the immense playground of the square right next to it.
items.summary: This hidden gem offers a mix of tapas and great classic Spanish/Ibiza dishes in a cozy and casual setting

items.title: Dilo Tapas
items.address: Carrer de Ramon Muntaner, 32, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Looking for a traditional Spanish tapas experience? Dilo Tapas offers a wide range of small plates perfect for sharing, with plenty of options for even the pickiest eaters. Enjoy outdoor seating in a vibrant yet relaxed setting!
items.summary: Looking for a traditional Spanish tapas experience? Dilo Tapas offers a wide range of small plates perfect for sharing, with plenty of options for even the pickiest eaters

items.title: Friteria Number 1
items.address: Avinguda d'Espanya, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: For quick and delicious Dutch snacks, Friteria Number 1 offers the perfect casual bite for families. Kids will love the fries, snacks and burgers, a typical no-fuss menu. Perfect for when you're out exploring and need a quick food stop!
items.summary: For quick and delicious Dutch snacks, Friteria Number 1 offers the perfect casual bite for families

items.title: Hostal Parque
items.address: Plaza del Parque, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Nestled in the bustling corner of Plaza del Parque, this cozy spot offers a huge sunny terrace with a menu with tapas and simple bites. And most importantly there is a playground rght in front; the green Salamander climbing and sliding structure next to Dalt vila. It has food everybody loves. From soups until noodles, a steak or some classic tapas. Super friendly priced, always and forever steady, not gourmet food but a simple neccesity for every family... It's a laid-back gem that always remained loyal to keeping it simple.
items.summary: Nestled in the bustling corner of Plaza del Parque, this cozy spot offers a huge sunny terrace with a menu with tapas and simple bites

items.title: La Bufalina
items.address: Avinguda d'Espanya, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: La Bufalina is a the quick stop for pizza slice lovers! With its generous portions of delicious Italian pizza, it’s a hit with both kids and adults. Grab a seat, dig into a slice, and enjoy a laid-back family meal on their terrace or just grab a bunch for take-away.
items.summary: La Bufalina is a the quick stop for pizza slice lovers! With its  generous portions of delicious Italian pizza, it’s a hit with both kids and adults

items.title: La Margarita Ibiza
items.address: Avinguda d'Espanya, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: A small and cozy pizzeria serving up the most delicious Italian pizzas with a relaxed family-friendly vibe on the terrace. We don't have to tell you most kids love pizza, but the other "plus" is the cool immense tree on Vara De Rey next to the terrace, where kids love to climb on. And let me tell you a little secret for when you are on tour: you can find their fab pizzas on Formentera too!
items.summary: A small and cozy pizzeria serving up the most delicious Italian pizzas with a relaxed family-friendly vibe on the terrace

items.title: Mikasa Ibiza
items.address: Passeig Joan Carles I, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: This Boutique boho spot is perfect for families looking for plant-based goodness, 100% Vegan! With stunning seaviews over the harbour from their 1st floor terrace and a healthy menu of vegan delights. The staff has always been super kind to our kids in this wonderful escape for eco-conscious parents with their picky little eaters.
items.summary: This Boutique boho spot is perfect for families looking for plant-based goodness, 100% Vegan! With stunning seaviews over the harbour from their 1st floor terrace and a healthy menu of vegan delights

items.title: Nobu Ibiza Bay Hotel Restaurants
items.address: Carrer de Ses Feixes, 52, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: For who can afford a bit more luxury... together with a seperate pool area especially for families. Three incredible dining spots: Nobu Restaurant with world-class Japanese and Peruvian flavors, Chambao Beach Club for Mediterranean seafood, and Bay Café for all-day healthy and mediterranean snacks. Families can relax by the stunning kids pool area, where access is free as well as usage of the beds, with a limited spend —perfect for a day of swimming and fine dining!
items.summary: For who can afford a bit more luxury

items.title: Oli Beach Restaurant
items.address: Passeig de Ses Pitiüses, Figueretas, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: A charming all-round Mediterranean restaurant with a variety of inernational choices as well, located right on Figueretas Beach. During the week they serve a lovely 3 course menu del dia for a super low price, a lot of kids go for the hotdogs though. Out little ones love the easy access to the sea while parents soak up the sun at their immense terrace and glass covered inside!
items.summary: A charming all-round Mediterranean restaurant with a variety of inernational choices as well, located right on Figueretas Beach

items.title: Oli Puig d'en Valls
items.address: Carrer de Santa Eulària, 07819 Puig d'en Valls
items.content: This casual local favorite has 3 locatons and is all about hearty comfort food dishes and a friendly atmosphere. The reason we showcase this one in our favorites list is because it has a cute private playground, kids happy = parents happy. Yeah!
items.summary: This casual local favorite has 3 locatons and is all about hearty comfort food dishes and a friendly atmosphere

items.title: Passion Marina
items.address: Passeig Joan Carles I, 23, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Passion Marina is perfect for families looking for the absolute best healthy breakfast, with also vegetarian and organic meals. It’s bright, cheerful, and full of healthy options for both kids and parents. Don’t miss their smoothies, a hit with the little ones! Personal favorite: Marina Breakfast. Extra tip, check out the website because Passion has several locations on our white isle!
items.summary: Passion Marina is perfect for families looking for the absolute best healthy breakfast, with also vegetarian and organic meals

items.title: Restaurante Il Giardinetto - Ibiza
items.address: Paseo Juan Carlos I, 17, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: This Italian gem is the perfect spot for families to enjoy wood-fired pizzas and fresh pastas! As parents we all need an allround italian and this is a cozy, welcoming place for lunch or dinner.
items.summary: This Italian gem is the perfect spot for families to enjoy wood-fired pizzas and fresh pastas! As parents we all need an allround italian and this is a cozy, welcoming place for lunch or dinner

items.title: Restaurante Mar y Cel
items.address: Carrer Andenes, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Enjoy fresh seafood right by the marina at Mar y Cel! It’s a lovely family spot with views of the sea and simple all-round dishes that parents and kids alike will enjoy. From pizzas to pasta, and the Spanish classical tapas. We love it because on one side there is a square with (small) playground and right in front of it is the beach with beautiful views on the crystal blue sea.
items.summary: Enjoy fresh seafood right by the marina at Mar y Cel! It’s a lovely family spot with views of the sea and simple all-round dishes that parents and kids alike will enjoy

items.title: Shu Talamanca Beach
items.address: Platja de Talamanca, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Tucked away on Talamanca Beach, Shu is a dream for pizza lovers and they have a seperate menu for sushi too. The front row of table means "feet in the sand", so kids can run wild while you sip on your cava. A perfect place for barefoot dining in a relaxed, beachy vibe!
items.summary: Tucked away on Talamanca Beach, Shu is a dream for pizza lovers and they have a seperate menu for sushi too

items.title: The Green Market
items.address: Carrer de Navarra, 32, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Bakery & Fresh healthy take away paradise! The Green Market serves a daily changing menu of warm dishes, salads, fresh smoothies, and well-filled sandwiches, making it a great stop for families. There is a terrace in front, all-though many people take their food to enjoy as picnick or office lunch. The fact that it is on a square where many kids play with a playground in front make it even more ideal for your family pit stop. And special mention to their older sister "Es Tap Nou", which serves tostadas and salads too, all coming out of their own fruit shop!
items.summary: Bakery & Fresh healthy take away paradise! The Green Market serves a daily changing menu of warm dishes, salads, fresh smoothies, and well-filled sandwiches, making it a great stop for families

items.title: The Skinny Kitchen Ibiza
items.address: Passeig de Ses Pitiüses, Figueretas, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: Right on the beachfront of Figueretas, The Skinny Kitchen is a paradise for health-conscious families! From guilt-free burgers to superfood bowls, Enjoy nutritious and delicious meals while watching the kids play on the beach. Not summer? Always do check their Socials, because in some years they close in off season.
items.summary: Right on the beachfront of Figueretas, The Skinny Kitchen is a paradise for health-conscious families! From guilt-free burgers to superfood bowls, Enjoy nutritious and delicious meals while watching the kids play on the beach

items.title: TKO Tacos Eivissa
items.address: Carrer de Barcelona, 5, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: If your family loves Tex-Mex, head to TKO Tacos! With an array of tacos, burritos, and nachos, this laid-back eatery is a fun and casual spot for a quick bite. Super cheap, starting at just 1 euro! Perfect for families on the go who love mexican flavors.
items.summary: If your family loves Tex-Mex, head to TKO Tacos! With an array of tacos, burritos, and nachos, this laid-back eatery is a fun and casual spot for a quick bite

items.title: El Bardo
items.address: Plaça de Antoni Albert i Nieto, 07800 Ibiza
items.content: If you love hearty Argentine cuisine and empañadas, El Bardo is the place to be! It’s a friendly and simple, laid-back restaurant with Spanish and Argentine fusion dishes that are perfect for families due to the situation right on top of the immense playground of this great square.
items.summary: If you love hearty Argentine cuisine and empañadas, El Bardo is the place to be! It’s a friendly and simple, laid-back restaurant with Spanish and Argentine fusion dishes that are perfect for families due to the situation right on top of the immense playground of this great square

items.title: Imprevisto
items.address: Carrer de Vicent Serra i Orvay, 45, y orvay, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands
items.content: Stylish industrial, but also cosy boho looking Italian on the edge of Ibiza Town with pizzas and pastas. Next to a big square for kids to cycle and play. With an underground parking 1 minute away. What else? Perfect for families with active kids playing nearby.
items.summary: Stylish industrial, but also cosy boho looking Italian on the edge of Ibiza Town with pizzas and pastas

items.title: Can Tixedó Art Café
items.address: Ctra. Santa Inés, Carr. de Forada, Km 5, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza
items.content: Combining art exhibitions and Mediterranean cuisine, perfect for families. Cozy terrace for parents and kids to enjoy.
items.summary: Combining art exhibitions and Mediterranean cuisine, perfect for families

items.title: Juntos House
items.address: Camí de S Pla, S/N, 07816 Sant Mateu d'Albarca, Ibiza
items.content: Looking for: countryside, ecologic mission, locally produced gifts & products, and an exeptional experience? Come to this farm-to-table diamond in a rustic finca, ideal for families - where kids' play around in the garden.
items.summary: Looking for: countryside, ecologic mission, locally produced gifts & products, and an exeptional experience? Come to this farm-to-table diamond in a rustic finca, ideal for families - where kids' play around in the garden

items.title: Pom Thai
items.address: Carrer de Cantàbria, 12-18, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears
items.content: Chich look & feel, beautiful garden with pool in the middle Thai restaurant offering authentic flavors.
items.summary: Chich look & feel, beautiful garden with pool in the middle Thai restaurant offering authentic flavors

items.title: Rita's Cantina
items.address: Carrer de Madrid, 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Illes Balears
items.content: Rita’s is a cozy harbor-side spot with simple homely international dishes and Dutch pancakes. One of the cheapest cafe's perfect for families with kids exploring the promenade.
items.summary: Rita’s is a cozy harbor-side spot with simple homely international dishes and Dutch pancakes

items.title: Bam-Bu-Ku
items.address: Carrer des Molí, 10, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Illes Balears
items.content: Fun for kids at this kids' beach club with sand, sunbeds, pool and Ibiza’s only wave machine. International menu with all sorts of food.
items.summary: Fun for kids at this kids' beach club with sand, sunbeds, pool and Ibiza’s only wave machine

items.title: Elements Ibiza
items.address: Playa de Benirrás, 07815 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza
items.content: Beachfront restaurant offering Mediterranean fusion cuisine with a kid-friendly team right by the sea. It is a bit more upscale, so no daily place, if you are looking for Ibiza affordable vibes.
items.summary: Beachfront restaurant offering Mediterranean fusion cuisine with a kid-friendly team right by the sea

items.title: La Luna Nell'orto
items.address: Calle de sa Cala, 07810 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza
items.content: Super romantic and cute italian restaurant with homemade dishes and a charming garden, perfect for family gatherings.
items.summary: Super romantic and cute italian restaurant with homemade dishes and a charming garden, perfect for family gatherings

items.title: La Paloma
items.address: Carrer Can Pou, 4, 07812 Sant Llorenç de Balàfia, Ibiza
items.content: Organic Mediterranean cuisine in a tranquil garden, where children can play while parents relax.
items.summary: Organic Mediterranean cuisine in a tranquil garden, where children can play while parents relax

items.title: San Carlos Bar Restaurante
items.address: Plaza San Carlos, 6, 07850 Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza
items.content: Traditional Spanish dishes with a large terrace, great for families with kids who want to play outdoors.
items.summary: Traditional Spanish dishes with a large terrace, great for families with kids who want to play outdoors

items.title: The Boat House
items.address: Playa Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza
items.content: Nautical-themed beachfront restaurant with Middle Eastern influences and several tastes of the world, mixed with Mediterranean dishes. Great menu and very playful decor, in one part you even feel like being under water... Plenty of fun space for kids to wonder around and the immense sandy beach of Cala Vicente right in front. A special place, open almost all year, with good value for money.
items.summary: Nautical-themed beachfront restaurant with Middle Eastern influences and several tastes of the world, mixed with Mediterranean dishes

items.title: The Giri Cafe
items.address: Plaza España, 5, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza
items.content: A bohemian café with a beautiful garden, their own home made playground at their mini farm behind the garden, serving fresh, local Mediterranean dishes. Not cheap, but a lovely healthy surprise.
items.summary: A bohemian café with a beautiful garden, their own home made playground at their mini farm behind the garden, serving fresh, local Mediterranean dishes

items.title: Bistro Mondo
items.address: Carrer de sa Cala, 11, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Illes Balears
items.content: Relax in their secluded garden while enjoying comfort food with global flavors. Enjoy comfort food of the best chefs, perhaps after a day at the market?
items.summary: Relax in their secluded garden while enjoying comfort food with global flavors

items.title: Lydia’s North
items.address: Lugar Venda de Safragell, 16, 07812 Sant Joan de Labritja, Balearic Islands
items.content: Burgers, hotdogs, top-notch nachos, and live music create a fun vibe at Lydia’s North. A family favorite, snacks and fun... just watch out for the nearby road with small kids.
items.summary: Burgers, hotdogs, top-notch nachos, and live music create a fun vibe at Lydia’s North

items.title: Sa Caleta
items.address: Platja d'es Bol Nou, s/n, 07830, Balearic Islands
items.content: Sa Caleta is the secret spot where your kids can pretend to be pirates on the boat perched on the cliff sand while you enjoy Mediterranean dishes. All with a breath taking seaview and the friendlies staff.
items.summary: Sa Caleta is the secret spot where your kids can pretend to be pirates on the boat perched on the cliff sand while you enjoy Mediterranean dishes

items.title: Vinyl Burger
items.address: Carrer de César Puget Riquer, 3, 07817 Sant Jordi
items.content: This rock-and-roll-inspired burger joint is a hit with both kids as parents! Indulge in juicy burgers and fries while soaking in the fun, retro décor. A casual and playful spot perfect for a quick family meal.
items.summary: This rock-and-roll-inspired burger joint is a hit with both kids as parents! Indulge in juicy burgers and fries while soaking in the fun, retro décor

items.title: Bar Can Berri
items.address: Plaça de l'Església, 07829 Sant Agustí des Vedrà
items.content: Fun for kids due to the outside lay-out on one of San Augustins hilly mountains, where kids roam freely.
items.summary: Fun for kids due to the outside lay-out on one of San Augustins hilly mountains, where kids roam freely

items.title: Bar Can Jaume Vadella Beach
items.address: Playa de Cala Vadella, 07830 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Located on Cala Vadella beach, perfect for young kids due to its shallow waters. The bouncy castle is available most of the year, with a reasonably priced kids' menu.
items.summary: Located on Cala Vadella beach, perfect for young kids due to its shallow waters

items.title: Bar San Francisco
items.address: Carretera Ibiza–San José, km 8, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: This is also one of our favorites for a quick bite with kids, their menu has the homemade healthy feel. With daily specials, quiches,
items.summary: This is also one of our favorites for a quick bite with kids, their menu has the homemade healthy feel

items.title: Boutique Hostal Salinas La Curandera de Salinas
items.address: Ctra. de Sa Canal, Km 5, Ses Salines, 07818 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Pool with standing area for kids aged 5+ and a playground made from recycled materials. Simple, seasonal food with locally sourced ingredients.
items.summary: Pool with standing area for kids aged 5+ and a playground made from recycled materials

items.title: Cala Bassa Beach Club (CBbC)
items.address: Cala Bassa Beach, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: The clear, shallow waters and soft sand make Cala Bassa perfect for families, especially young kids who can safely swim and play. Plus, the beach club provides sunbeds, umbrellas, and even live DJ music, creating a relaxed yet vibrant atmosphere where kids love to wander and wobble around. This expansive spot features three dining areas with options ranging from Mediterranean flavors to gourmet sushi and caviar—a luxurious experience for all ages.
items.summary: The clear, shallow waters and soft sand make Cala Bassa perfect for families, especially young kids who can safely swim and play

items.title: Can Bass
items.address: Carretera Sant Josep KM 7.7, 07830 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Old finca with a vast garden, offering a wide menu from risotto to duck. Kid-friendly dishes and welcoming staff make this a family favorite.
items.summary: Old finca with a vast garden, offering a wide menu from risotto to duck

items.title: Can Domingo & Mimí Pizza Bistrot
items.address: Carretera San José km 9.8, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Can Domingo and Mimi's are two of a kind. Can Domingo has a bit more gourmet italian food, while as family we recommend going to their other italian concept Mimi. Both are suated in their beautiful garden grounds on top of a hill, but Mimi's focus is pizza and less expensive than it's older sister Can Domingo. Due to the prices not a place where a resident would go weekly, but they are both definitely restaurants you have to try!
items.summary: Can Domingo and Mimi's are two of a kind

items.title: Can Jordi Blues Station
items.address: Carretera de Ibiza a Sant Josep km 7.7, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Bar, supermarket, live music and especially a vibrant place where the owner Vicente makes everybody feel at home.
items.summary: Bar, supermarket, live music and especially a vibrant place where the owner Vicente makes everybody feel at home

items.title: Chimichurri Restaurant
items.address: Carretera de Sant Josep, km 7.5, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Nestled near San José, it’s a meat lover’s paradise with juicy Texas ribs, Argentine steaks, and the quirkiest half-meter sausages you’ve ever seen! The garden is perfect for families, offering plenty of space for kids to explore while parents relax and enjoy their meal.
items.summary: Nestled near San José, it’s a meat lover’s paradise with juicy Texas ribs, Argentine steaks, and the quirkiest half-meter sausages you’ve ever seen! The garden is perfect for families, offering plenty of space for kids to explore while parents relax and enjoy their meal

items.title: Destino Café
items.address: Carrer Pere Escanelles, 4, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Nice little tapas place in the village of Sant Josep, with good value for money. Kids love the playful way you get to choose your food here. The friendly staff calls the guests one by one to come for an extensve presentation and explanation, all deserts are shown on a large plate at the end too, so you can understand your kids. The variety in both healthy, as originality tapas make it for certain both you as your little ones will be happily fed.
items.summary: Nice little tapas place in the village of Sant Josep, with good value for money

items.title: El Silencio
items.address: Cala Molí, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: The food is decent but pricey for what they call "gourmet"—perhaps we’re too spoiled in Ibiza! However, the real gem is the SWIMMING POOL at the back, available for anyone that grabds a drink, making it perfect for families. Head to the back of the beach bar, and you’ll find a chic hidden oasis where you can relax by the sea in style.
items.summary: The food is decent but pricey for what they call "gourmet"—perhaps we’re too spoiled in Ibiza! However, the real gem is the SWIMMING POOL at the back, available for anyone that grabds a drink, making it perfect for families

items.title: Es Galliner
items.address: Carrer Pere de Portugal, 3, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Family owned Spanish restaurant. Specialising in aged meats, grilled fish, traditional dishes, jamons, fresh prawns. All-day kitchen.
items.summary: Family owned Spanish restaurant

items.title: Friend's Kitchen Bowling & Diner
items.address: Carrer de la Murtra, nº2, 07817 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Bowling fun, American burgers & steaks, and of course piles of nuggets and hotdogs. The arcade has tons of video games, pool tables, and a soft play area for kids.
items.summary: Bowling fun, American burgers & steaks, and of course piles of nuggets and hotdogs

items.title: Hard Rock Cafe: The Beach
items.address: Platja d'en Bossa s/n, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza
items.content: More affordable than other Playa d’en Bossa options, with beach beds, friendly kid-welcoming staff, and a kids' club. A mix of burgers, sushi, and circus-like shows.
items.summary: More affordable than other Playa d’en Bossa options, with beach beds, friendly kid-welcoming staff, and a kids' club

items.title: Mesa Ibiza
items.address: Carrer del Carre, 5, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Surprisingly fun and kids friendly place, with a diverse menu that runs from healthy soups, pastas, original fish & meat dishes to delicious pizzas.
items.summary: Surprisingly fun and kids friendly place, with a diverse menu that runs from healthy soups, pastas, original fish & meat dishes to delicious pizzas

items.title: Racó Verd
items.address: Carrer Pere Escanelles, 5, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: Nice restaurant with an affordable menu in the middle of Sant Josep, nice for kids because... It has lovely garden, that is surrounded by their authentic finca and this makes it a safe space to play. While the adults chat kids can run around and enjoy the music - yes! They also often do live music in the garden. The dishes for kids run from quesedillas with ham and cheese, to do it yourself tortilla wraps with chicken, chili con carne or veggies. And much more, all reasonably priced. There is also an ice-cream corner and cute shop too!
items.summary: Nice restaurant with an affordable menu in the middle of Sant Josep, nice for kids because

items.title: Restaurant El Carmen
items.address: Playa Cala d’Hort, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: A classic place, located right in front of the mesmarizing "Es Vedra" stone, a beautiful romantic beach. A quality place that never changed, always stayed solid in quality. It is known for the best paella of the island and it's fun for your kids because you can watch them play on the beach while you sip on your wine.
items.summary: A classic place, located right in front of the mesmarizing "Es Vedra" stone, a beautiful romantic beach

items.title: The View at 7Pines Resort Ibiza
items.address: Carrer Puig Delfín s/n, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia
items.content: The View at 7Pines Resort Ibiza combines stunning views of Es Vedrà with Mediterranean-inspired cuisine. While adults soak in the scenery, kids can enjoy the pool, making it a hit for families. With a dedicated children’s menu and the chance to splash around, it’s a great spot for a fun, family-friendly meal!
items.summary: The View at 7Pines Resort Ibiza combines stunning views of Es Vedrà with Mediterranean-inspired cuisine

items.title: Tropicana Cala Jondal
items.address: Playa Cala Jondal, 07839 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Family beach club with a small playground. Tasty menu with half portions for kids and a cozy place for families to enjoy lunch after a beach day.
items.summary: Family beach club with a small playground

items.title: Ciento80
items.address: Edf. Sud Ibiza Suites, Passeig ses Pitiüses, S/N, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears
items.content: Newby sister of Es Jardin des Fruitera. The kids can run wild on the beachside boulevard (yep, it’s a kid-proof area), and you can enjoy some seriously fin Mediterranean food that’s gourmet-level without the high prices. Yeah!
items.summary: Newby sister of Es Jardin des Fruitera

items.title: Yemanja
items.address: Cala Jondal, 07839 Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza
items.content: Yemanjá is your go-to beachfront paradise with divine paella, fresh seafood and grilled meat, and stunning sea views. Kids can play freely on the sandy beach or rocky hill while you relax in a laid-back vibe.
items.summary: Yemanjá is your go-to beachfront paradise with divine paella, fresh seafood and grilled meat, and stunning sea views

items.title: Social Point
items.address: Carretera d'Eivissa a Sant Josep, Km 2, 07817, Illes Balears
items.content: Family-friendly spacious industial barrack, with immense terrace. Social Point serves quality grilled meats and burgers in a welcoming sphere, for a reasonable price. Cozy heaters and fires in winter time and often live music.
items.summary: Family-friendly spacious industial barrack, with immense terrace

items.title: Restaurante S’illa des Bosc
items.address: Diseminado S'illa des Bosc, 755, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Balearic Islands
items.content: Enjoy Mediterranean classics with a super delicious modern twist and absolutely breathtaking views at Cala Comte. Year-round! Perfect for families with kids playing on the beach and sandy cliffs.
items.summary: Enjoy Mediterranean classics with a super delicious modern twist and absolutely breathtaking views at Cala Comte

items.title: 17 Food & Drink
items.address: Carrer sa Platja, 16, 07829 Ibiza, Illes Balears
items.content: Offering fresh Italian delicacy pastas and pizzas, made with the best ingredients. Personal favorite and the perfect place to unwind with stunning views of the sea at Cala Tarida.
items.summary: Offering fresh Italian delicacy pastas and pizzas, made with the best ingredients

items.title: Can Sala
items.address: Avinguda de Vicent Serra, S/N, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Illes Balears
items.content: Hidden gem with Mediterranean flair, Spanish tapas and a mini-playground for kids in the garden. Relaxation guaranteed for parents.
items.summary: Hidden gem with Mediterranean flair, Spanish tapas and a mini-playground for kids in the garden

items.title: Aubergine by Atzaró
items.address: Carretera de San Miquel, KM 9,5, Ibiza
items.content: A countryside gem with fresh farm-to-table meals. Families can relax while kids explore the gardens.
items.summary: A countryside gem with fresh farm-to-table meals

items.title: Can Mimosa
items.address: Calle San Vicente, 12, Santa Gertrudis, 07814 Ibiza
items.content: Beautiful finca with a garden where kids can run free while families enjoy local Mediterranean dishes.
items.summary: Beautiful finca with a garden where kids can run free while families enjoy local Mediterranean dishes

items.title: El Deseo Ibiza
items.address: Av. Punta Arabí, 117, 07840 Es Canar, Ibiza
items.content: Colorful Mexican restaurant with a fun atmosphere for families and plenty of kid-friendly menu options.
items.summary: Colorful Mexican restaurant with a fun atmosphere for families and plenty of kid-friendly menu options

items.title: Es Jardins De Fruitera
items.address: Ctra. Santa Gertrudis a Sant Llorenç, Km 1.5, 07840 Santa Gertrudis, Ibiza
items.content: Charming family-friendly restaurant located in a traditional Ibizan farmhouse. It offers Mediterranean cuisine with a modern twist, featuring dishes like local fish, rice, and high-quality meats. Families will love the large outdoor terrace and garden, and kids can enjoy the dedicated playground with bouncy castles while parents relax in the beautiful surroundings.
items.summary: Charming family-friendly restaurant located in a traditional Ibizan farmhouse

items.title: La Chickeria
items.address: Carrer de Cesar Puget Riquer, 17, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Río, Ibiza
items.content: Grilled chicken in a casual, kid-friendly setting with outdoor seating.
items.summary: Grilled chicken in a casual, kid-friendly setting with outdoor seating

items.title: Las Dalias Café
items.address: Carretera de San Carlos, KM 12, 07850 Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza
items.content: Located in the famous hippy market, offering Mediterranean snacks in a family-friendly setting.
items.summary: Located in the famous hippy market, offering Mediterranean snacks in a family-friendly setting

items.title: Le Monde
items.address: Calle Isidoro Macabich, 9, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Río, Ibiza
items.content: Casual Italian cuisine with a relaxed vibe and lots of space for families and children.
items.summary: Casual Italian cuisine with a relaxed vibe and lots of space for families and children

items.title: Pura Vida
items.address: Playa Niu Blau, Santa Eulalia del Río, 07849 Ibiza
items.content: Beachfront restaurant with a laid-back vibe, ideal for families with kids able to play nearby on the beach.
items.summary: Beachfront restaurant with a laid-back vibe, ideal for families with kids able to play nearby on the beach

items.title: Sa Punta Ibiza
items.address: Carrer Es Puet de Talamanca, s/n, 07819 Talamanca, Ibiza
items.content: Chic seafront dining with plenty of space for families to enjoy Mediterranean fusion cuisine.
items.summary: Chic seafront dining with plenty of space for families to enjoy Mediterranean fusion cuisine

items.title: Wild Beets
items.address: Carrer Salvà, 19, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Río, Ibiza
items.content: Plant-based dishes in a bright and airy space, perfect for health-conscious families.
items.summary: Plant-based dishes in a bright and airy space, perfect for health-conscious families

items.title: Kathmandu
items.address: Calle San Vicente, 49 Bajo, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Río
items.content: Dive into flavorful Indian dishes while kids enjoy their hidden but cool soft play kids area. Family dining made fun and easy!
items.summary: Dive into flavorful Indian dishes while kids enjoy their hidden but cool soft play kids area
